pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.utils

Interface SearchEngineUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchEngineUtilsImpl

    public interface SearchEngineUtils
    Interface used to create HQL for given search parameters
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasTableAnyParameters(String[] searchParameters)
      Returns TRUE if the Array of the String contains value different than null or "".
      String prepareHqlUsingContactFormMessageSearchParameters(String[] searchParameters, String searchType, String[] fieldsName)
      Creates and returns the HQL as a String for given parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • hasTableAnyParameters

        boolean hasTableAnyParameters(String[] searchParameters)
        Returns TRUE if the Array of the String contains value different than null or "".
        Parameters:
        searchParameters - The String[] containing the values to be checked
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result

      • prepareHqlUsingContactFormMessageSearchParameters

        String prepareHqlUsingContactFormMessageSearchParameters(String[] searchParameters,
                                                         String searchType,
                                                         String[] fieldsName)
        Creates and returns the HQL as a String for given parameters. The searchType should contains the text like "FROM nameOfTheEnitity "
        Parameters:
        searchParameters - The String[] containing the search parameters
        searchType - The String containing the begging of the HQL
        fieldsName - The String[] containing the name of the entity fields
        Returns:
        A String representing the HQL
